course_title: Staying Healthy in Pediatrics: Intro to Clinical Specialty Practicum
class_notes: Some clinical activities are simulation and virtual, others are in a face to face clinical environment. Dates TBA.
course_description: In this course, the student will deliver well care to children and their families with faculty oversight within the clinical/simulated setting with emphasis placed on advanced pediatric health assessment skills, diagnostic reasoning, and development of plans of care.
sections: Class Nbr: 5929, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Rodriguez/Brown, Status: Open
